about:
Lions Club of Bangalore Prerana *(District 317-E)* is a part of Lions Clubs International, chartered in March 2022 by Lion Sowmya B. A. as its charter president.

The club was chartered with a team of 21 members who aspire to serve the less fortunate within the local community and to maintain a clean and green environment.

The focus areas of the team are environment, health, education, empowering women and children with skill-based training programs and care for the aged and disabled.

officers.name: Lion Dr. Shiva Shankar G. N.
officers.title: Ⅰ Vice President
